name: The Lamentable Burden of Haverbrook
description:
You've inherited your grandfathers estate and...something else. You'll have to feed it for fear of it leaving and looking for it's own food.

You'll play as a man who's inherited his grandfathers estate and the monster he kept in the barn. If you don't feed it it'll get worse. It seems to be fine drinking some blood from your cattle but you fear that may not last.

Stefen Menzel
Zack Gilbertson
Allen Haworth
Dillon Marcus
Rhea Dykoski!
